name: Walk Whale
intro: If you do not believe a whale can walk, look at me.

name: Walk Whale
intro: I don't have external ears, so I feel vibrations by putting my head on the ground.

name: Sabertooth
intro: Yummy mammoth everyday!

name: Sabertooth
intro: The reason why I'm extinct...is my food is extinct.

name: Mammoth
intro: I have no idea how to use my nose.

name: Mammoth
intro: Although I have a reliable coat, I still feel chilly in the Ice Age.

name: T-Rex
intro: I always feel hungry...just like now.

name: T-Rex
intro: Doctor said the recommended calorie count for me is 40,000...daily.

name: Passenger Pigeon
intro: Will I be able to fly one day?

name: Passenger Pigeon
intro: I have no idea why everyone thinks I'm delicious.

name: Golden Toad
intro: Be aware of FUNGUS!

name: Triceratops
intro: I will have the strongest power in future!

name: Triceratops
intro: I love Jackson's chameleon because we all have three horns.

name: Pterosaur
intro: I do not know the function of my hands.

name: Pterosaur
intro: Let me repeat it one more time: Pterosaur is NOT a dinosaur.

name: Quagga
intro: Mom said she ran out of ink when I was born.

name: Quagga
intro: Donkey existed, Zebra existed, Quagga extinct...a sad story bro.

name: Stegosaurus
intro: I admire my brother...he can walk with only two legs!

name: Stegosaurus
intro: The most vulnerable part on me is belly.

name: Panda
intro: I love bamboo.

name: Panda
intro: I am the emperor's mount in Chinese mythology.

name: Thylacine
intro: I am not a Hyenya...

name: Thylacine
intro: Have you ever heard of Tasmanian Tiger?

name: Pangolin
intro: Insect are my favorite!

name: Pangolin
intro: I don't think there is a medical use on my scale.

name: Elephant bird
intro: I will be the biggest bird on Earth!

name: Elephant bird
intro: I am the biggest bird on Earth.

name: Pinta Island tortoise
intro: I became a sea turtle last night!

name: Pinta Island tortoise
intro: If you know Lonesome George, you will remember us.

name: Dodo Bird
intro: Glad I'm not the only flightless bird.

name: Giant Anteater
intro: Guess how long my tongue can get...45cm!

name: Giant Anteater
intro: Based on my name, you know what I eat.

name: Black Rhino
intro: I know there is a pink pig who also likes to roll in mud ponds.

name: Black Rhino
intro: I never thought the horn would become dangerous for me one day.

name: Amur Leopard
intro: Surfing yesterday, 84 of us were counted by humans, over.

name: Amur Leopard
intro: Recover prey population before recovering me please.

name: Ground Sloth
intro: Hope I will work in DMV like Mr. Flash one day.

name: Ground Sloth
intro: Hel... lo... how... are... you... to... day...?

name: Ankylosaurus
intro: My tail is heavy.

name: Ankylosaurus
intro: Armour up and get your tail ready.

name: Velociraptor
intro: As you can see, I have feathers, not scales.

name: Velociraptor
intro: My brother is popular in movies.

name: Spinosaurus
intro: Have a look at the sail on my back...in the future.

name: Spinosaurus
intro: A semi-Aquatic lifestyle is the perfect choice.

name: Brachiosaurus
intro: Scientists believe I had a bird-like respiratory system in order to get enough oxygen.

name: Brachiosaurus
intro: Be aware of the blind area of my vision.

name: Cave Bear
intro: Cave bear is supposed to stay in the cave.

name: Cave Bear
intro: A healthy diet plan always comes with plants, fruits, and animal protein.

name: Great Auk
intro: I'm not a penguin, I can fly.

name: Great Auk
intro: Proud of letting bird species extinction be noticed by scientists.

name: Yunnan Lake Newt
intro: Endemic species means I was only in Yunnan Province.

name: Ainsworth's Salamander
intro: Lungless salamander uses skin for respiration.

name: Kronosaurus
intro: Everyone looked cute in childhood.

name: Kronosaurus
intro: Short-necked plesiosaur, not dinosaur.

name: Elasmosaurus
intro: An extraordinarily long neck is here!

name: Elasmosaurus
intro: Slow down in swimming, slow down in life.

name: Pyrenean Ibex
intro: Extremely good at playing leap frog!

name: Pyrenean Ibex
intro: Use to be resurrected through cloning, but failed.

name: Guam Flying Fox
intro: Fox is cute, I'm cuter.

name: Guam Flying Fox
intro: A long journey deserved with the best fruit.

name: Barbary Lion
intro: Practice roaring everyday.

name: Barbary Lion
intro: A king always comes with a magnificent mane.

name: Caribbean Monk Seal
intro: Lanugo helps me prevent colds!

name: Caribbean Monk Seal
intro: Please leave some fish for me next time.

name: Schomburgk's Deer
intro: We were named after a naturalist found us.

name: Schomburgk's Deer
intro: Not every deer can become the urban animal.

name: Ezo Wolf
intro: Both Ezo and Hokkaido wolf go for me.

name: Ezo Wolf
intro: Developers want some special effect on me.

name: Toolache Wallaby
intro: Consider the most agile and swift!

name: Toolache Wallaby
intro: Two legs leaping are never faster than four legs running.

name: Steller's Sea Cow
intro: Swimming in the sea is sleepy...Zzz

name: Steller's Sea Cow
intro: Seaweed only.

name: Bramble Cay Melomys
intro: Climate change has claimed its first mammal extinction-me.

name: Desert Rat-kangaroo
intro: Minimal water is enough for me.

name: Tarpan
intro: No one can stop my desire for freedom.

name: Tarpan
intro: Not every horse needs a rider.

name: Blue-footed Booby
intro: My cousin's feet have a separate color, blue and red.

name: Blue-footed Booby
intro: I want to go to the pier and get some fries as well.

name: Vaquita
intro: Don't you think I'm cute with w mouth?

name: Vaquita
intro: There is a total of 20 family members being counted by the scientists.

name: Bactrian Camel
intro: Double hump, double cool.

name: Bactrian Camel
intro: I can drink up to 40 gallons at once.

name: Cobra
intro: Attention, we have different venom potency.

name: Cobra
intro: Glad to help in medical advancement.

name: Saola
intro: Asian Unicorn is another name for me.

name: Saola
intro: One of the most recent large mammals to be discovered.

name: African Wild Dog
intro: I have a big family with more than 40 members!

name: African Wild Dog
intro: I have only four toes per foot...no digitigrade.

name: Bornean Orangutan
intro: Prefer to stay on the trees forever if possible.

name: Bornean Orangutan
intro: We use Long Calls for communication.

name: Cross River Gorilla
intro: When I grow up, I want to have a silverback!

name: Cross River Gorilla
intro: You know what, Cross River is a state in Nigeria.

name: Blue Whale
intro: My heart will grow bigger than a car in the future.

name: Blue Whale
intro: 4 tons of krill a day, keep the doctor away.
